Question: Q) What will be the perimeter of given rectangle ?
Solution_text: --------------------------------------SOLUTION------------------------------------------- => perimeter of Rectangle = 2(length + breadth) => $$2(3+x)$$ => ThereFore Option $2$ is right selection
